review_data.title: Enjoying authentic Japanese kitchen.
review_data.content: The ladies managing the restaurant and the chef are very passionate about their place, the food they serve. It’s all done with devotion and humility. The California rolls were as outstanding as the soup.

review_data.title: Great meal

review_data.title: Good portion size and friendly staff
review_data.content: The staff was very friendly. My friends had the boxes and I had the sushi. The chicken box was very tasty. My friends couldn’t finish all the food in the boxes along with the soup. The sushi was good but I have had better. Please...More

review_data.title: Erstklassiges Sushi zu fairen Preisen
review_data.content: Freundliche, kompetente Bedienung, Angenehmes Ambiente. Feine japanische Speisen und vor allem hochklassiges Sushi zu fairen Preisen. Top!!
